description: Professional-grade text-to-video generation with advanced motion control and high-quality output

prompt.description: The text prompt to guide video generation
prompt.placeholder: A stylish woman walks down a Tokyo street filled with warm glowing neon...

duration.description: The duration of the generated video in seconds

aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the generated video frame

negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt to specify what should not appear in the video

cfg_scale.description: The CFG (Classifier Free Guidance) scale - how closely the model should follow your prompt

prompt_details.style_guide: Create vivid, detailed descriptions with strong visual elements and clear motion patterns
best_practices: Use specific, descriptive language for scenes and characters
Include lighting conditions and atmosphere details
Describe clothing, textures, and materials clearly
Mention specific locations and environmental details
Use cinematic terminology for professional results

example_prompts.title: Urban Night Scene
example_prompts.prompt: A stylish woman walks down a Tokyo street filled with warm glowing neon and animated city signage. She wears a black leather jacket, a long red dress, and black boots, and carries a black purse.

example_prompts.title: Nature Documentary
example_prompts.prompt: A majestic eagle soars through misty mountain peaks at golden hour, its wings spread wide against dramatic clouds, camera following its graceful flight path

request.prompt: A cat playing with a colorful ball in a sunny garden
A professional chef preparing a gourmet dish in a modern kitchen, steam rising from the pan, dramatic lighting highlighting the ingredients
request.negative_prompt: blur, low quality, amateur, poor lighting

request.prompt: A young artist painting on a canvas in a bright studio, paint brushes and colors scattered around, natural light streaming through large windows

url.description: URL where the video can be downloaded

content_type.description: MIME type of the video file

file_size.description: Size of the video file in bytes

usage_tips: Use detailed, specific descriptions for better results
Higher CFG scale values make the model follow prompts more closely
Use negative prompts to avoid unwanted elements
10-second videos allow for more complex scenes and movements
Consider aspect ratio based on your intended use case
limitations: Complex scenes with many elements may be challenging
Processing time increases with longer durations

pricing.estimated_cost: Higher cost for 10-second videos vs 5-second videos
